TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExpressionEditorSheet extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示自定义表达式的设计时编辑器表。

span.span: Represents a design-time editor sheet for a custom expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义表达式编辑器表使开发人员可以设置在设计时的自定义表达式的属性。A custom expression editor sheet lets a developer set properties on a custom expression at design-time. 可以使用表达式的字符串; 设置控件的属性值表达式字符串是由表达式生成器的运行时和设计时评估由表达式编辑器。Control property values can be set using expression strings; the expression strings are evaluated at run time by an expression builder and at design time by an expression editor. 当您浏览设计时属性网格中的控件的属性，可视化设计器显示一个对话框来设置控件属性提供的值的表达式。When you browse the property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the value for a control property. 可以选择基于的表达式前缀列表的表达式类型。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 当从列表中选择表达式前缀时，可视化设计器使用关联和对象来计算和转换的表达式字符串基于该类型的表达式的语法。When you select an expression prefix from the list, the visual designer uses the associated and objects to evaluate and convert the expression string based on the syntax for that type of expression. 可视化设计器使用表达式编辑器表属性为提示输入一个或多个将合并到自定义表达式字符串的字符串。The visual designer uses expression editor sheet properties to prompt for one or more strings that combine into the custom expression string. 通常情况下，若要在设计时提供新的表达式类型，您定义唯一的表达式前缀和提供自定义和实现。Typically, to supply a new expression type at design time, you define a unique expression prefix and provide custom and implementations. （可选） 可以提供自定义实现，用于定义属性，用于构建表达式。Optionally, you can provide a custom implementation that defines properties that are used to form the expression. 若要将表达式前缀与表达式生成器和表达式编辑器相关联，将应用属性和一个属性为自定义类，然后为和配置的表达式前缀中的表达式生成器`expressionBuilders` Web 配置文件中的元素。To associate an expression prefix with an expression builder and an expression editor, apply the attribute and an attribute to the custom class, and then configure the expression prefix for an expression builder in the `expressionBuilders` element in the Web configuration file. 默认实现方法返回使用单一的输入的字符串的表达式的基本编辑器表。The default implementation of the method returns a basic editor sheet, which uses a single input string to form the expression. 派生自的自定义表达式编辑器可以重写方法以返回表实现的自定义编辑器。Custom expression editors that are derived from the can override the method to return a custom editor sheet implementation. 通常情况下，自定义编辑器表包含用于生成的表达式字符串的多个属性。Typically, a custom editor sheet contains multiple properties that are used to build the expression string. 方法返回基于当前的表达式属性生成的表达式字符串。The method returns the resulting expression string based on the current expression properties. 例如，类派生自类，并提供了评估和将资源字符串引用与控件属性关联在设计时实现。For example, the class derives from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating a resource string reference with a control property at design time. 类是与表达式前缀相关联`Resources`和实现。The class is associated with the expression prefix `Resources` and the implementation. 方法将返回，用于定义构成资源引用表达式的各个属性。The method returns a , which defines the individual properties that form a resource reference expression. 继承自类，必须重写以下成员：When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: - 方法以返回表实现的自定义编辑器。The method to return a custom editor sheet implementation. - 构造函数来实现自定义初始化表达式编辑器表实现的操作。The constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your expression editor sheet implementation.

span.para: 派生的自定义表达式编辑器表从类中，如果要定义新控件的属性值的表达式类型和想要生成的表达式字符串基于多个表达式属性值。在派生的类实现应包含以下:-可以在设计时设置的表达式字符串中每个非重复值的公共属性。 -的实现窗体编辑器表属性值中的自定义表达式字符串的方法。 -（可选） 设置初始值编辑器表属性构造函数实现。关联的自定义表达式编辑器类创建派生的编辑器表中的一个实例方法，使用该实例初始化为控件属性设置的当前表达式字符串并返回到可视化设计器的实例。可视化设计器可用于设置表属性的表达式，然后调用方法以便构成从输入的表达式表属性值的表达式字符串。

Derive a custom expression editor sheet from the class, if you are defining a new expression type for control property values and you want to build the expression string based on multiple expression property values. A derived class implementation should contain the following: - A public property for each distinct value in the expression string that can be set at design time. - An implementation of the method that forms the custom expression string from the editor sheet property values. - Optionally, a constructor implementation that sets the initial values of the editor sheet properties. The associated custom expression editor class creates an instance of the derived editor sheet in the method, initializes that instance with the current expression string set for the control property, and returns the instance to the visual designer. The visual designer allows you to set the expression sheet properties, and then calls the method to form the expression string from the input expression sheet property values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类为抽象类，不能创建的实例直接使用构造函数。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of an directly using the constructor.

span.para: 当派生自类中重写构造函数来实现自定义初始化表达式编辑器表实现的操作。例如，实现其他表达式的属性的自定义表达式编辑器表类可以定义中的表达式属性的默认值构造函数。自定义表达式编辑器表类可以定义使用输入的参数值设置为表达式属性初始值的其他公共构造函数重载。

When deriving from the class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your expression editor sheet implementation. For example, a custom expression editor sheet class that implements additional expression properties can define the default values for the expression properties in the constructor. A custom expression editor sheet class can define additional public constructor overloads that use input parameter values to set the initial values for the expression properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetExpression() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetExpression () As String

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回由表达式编辑器表属性值组成的表达式字符串。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the expression string that is formed by the expression editor sheet property values.

returns.span: 当前属性值的自定义表达式字符串。

span.span: The custom expression string for the current property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义表达式编辑器表包含多个表达式属性，它结合以形成一个表达式字符串的设计时设置。A custom expression editor sheet contains design-time settings for multiple expression properties, which are combined to form an expression string. 可以使用表达式的字符串; 设置控件的属性值在运行时，表达式生成器是求值的表达式字符串。Control property values can be set using expression strings; the expression strings are evaluated at run time by an expression builder. 方法返回从当前表达式的属性生成一个表达式字符串。The method returns an expression string that is built from the current expression properties. 可视化设计器可用于设置表属性的表达式，然后调用方法以获取表达式字符串并设置控件属性值。The visual designer allows you to set the expression sheet properties, and then calls the method to get the expression string and set the control property value.

span.para: 派生的自定义表达式编辑器表从类中，如果要定义新控件的属性值的表达式类型和想要生成的表达式字符串基于多个表达式属性值。在派生的类实现应包含以下:-可以在设计时设置的表达式字符串中每个非重复值的公共属性。 -的实现窗体编辑器表属性值中的自定义表达式字符串的方法。 -（可选） 设置初始值编辑器表属性构造函数实现。关联的自定义表达式编辑器类创建派生的编辑器表中的一个实例方法中，当前的表达式字符串设置为控件属性，初始化该实例，然后返回到视觉对象的实例设计器。可视化设计器可用于设置表属性的表达式，然后调用方法以便构成从输入的表达式表属性值的表达式字符串。

Derive a custom expression editor sheet from the class, if you are defining a new expression type for control property values and you want to build the expression string based on multiple expression property values. A derived class implementation should contain the following: - A public property for each distinct value in the expression string that can be set at design time. - An implementation of the method that forms the custom expression string from the editor sheet property values. - Optionally, a constructor implementation that sets the initial values of the editor sheet properties. The associated custom expression editor class creates an instance of the derived editor sheet in the method, initializes that instance with the current expression string set for the control property, and then returns the instance to the visual designer. The visual designer allows you to set the expression sheet properties, and then calls the method to form the expression string from the input expression sheet property values.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示表达式字符串是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the expression string is valid.

value.span: 如果表达式字符串有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the expression string is valid; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此基实现始终返回 `true`。This base implementation always returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServiceProvider As IServiceProvider
public: property IServiceProvider ^ ServiceProvider { IServiceProvider ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表达式编辑器表使用的服务提供程序实现。

span.span: Gets the service provider implementation that is used by the expression editor sheet.

value.span: 一个 ，通常由设计宿主提供，可用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: An , typically provided by the design host, that can be used to obtain additional design-time services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来设置实现自定义表达式编辑器表。Use the constructor to set the implementation for a custom expression editor sheet. 属性可用于访问所提供的设计器宿主服务。The property can be used to access services that are provided by the designer host. 例如，调用方法替换接口访问的项目项、 文档或通过可视化设计器提供的配置文件详细信息。For example, call the method with the interface to access project items, documents, or configuration file details that are provided through the visual designer.
